Art. 4.106. 
Derogatory provision
Where all or part of an estate comprises properties whose total cadastral income does not exceed 1,565 euros, the provisions of sub-title 8 are waived in accordance with articles 4.107 to 4.113.
Income from buildings not yet registered or not registered as separate parcels is determined, where applicable, in the same way as for property tax.
The calculation is based on the cadastral income existing on the day the estate is opened.
